org.springframework.jdbc.core.DataFieldMaxValueIncrementer

Packages that use DataFieldMaxValueIncrementer
org.springframework.jdbc.core.support Classes supporting the org.springframework.jdbc.core package.  
 

Uses of DataFieldMaxValueIncrementer in org.springframework.jdbc.core.support
 

Classes in org.springframework.jdbc.core.support that implement DataFieldMaxValueIncrementer
 class AbstractDataFieldMaxValueIncrementer
          Implementation of DataFieldMaxValueIncrementer Uses Template Method design pattern Subclasses should provide implementations of protected abstract methods.
 class HsqlMaxValueIncrementer
          Class to increment maximum value of a given HSQL table with the equivalent of an auto-increment column.
 class MySQLMaxValueIncrementer
          Class to increment maximum value of a given MySQL table with the equivalent of an auto-increment column.
 class OracleSequenceMaxValueIncrementer
          Class to retrieve the next value of a given Oracle SEQUENCE If the cacheSize is set then we will retrive that number of values from sequence and then serve the intermediate values without querying the database
